page.title: 12Our School
page.content: 7 year olds at Mudeford Infants School were asked to write what they would like people to know about their school. School Meals:You can bring a packed lunch every day.You can bring a drink of orange or tea.You can have a bag of crisps.You can bring sandwiches with something in them.We have a canteen and there is a chair for everyone. School Pets:Our rabbit is outside in the playground all year round and he has a wooly thick coat and the gerbils are at the back of the classes and the fish have a large tank at Mrs Holt's office and they are very small and there is all sorts of fish in there.Some are all coloured and some aren't and they are very interesting.
